### Commit Message

```bash

#!/bin/sh
# GENERATED BY CHATGPT

COMMIT_MSG_FILE=$1
COMMIT_MSG=$(head -n1 "$COMMIT_MSG_FILE")

add_gitmoji() {
  local emoji=$1
  if ! echo "$COMMIT_MSG" | grep -q "^$emoji"; then
    sed -i '' "1s/^/$emoji /" "$COMMIT_MSG_FILE"
  fi
}

case "$COMMIT_MSG" in
  feat*) add_gitmoji "âœ¨" ;;       # New feature
  fix*) add_gitmoji "ğŸ›" ;;        # Bug fix
  docs*) add_gitmoji "ğŸ“" ;;       # Documentation
  style*) add_gitmoji "ğŸ’„" ;;      # UI/style changes
  refactor*) add_gitmoji "â™»ï¸" ;;   # Code refactor
  perf*) add_gitmoji "âš¡ï¸" ;;       # Performance improvement
  test*) add_gitmoji "âœ…" ;;       # Tests
  build*) add_gitmoji "ğŸ—ï¸" ;;      # Build system changes
  ci*) add_gitmoji "ğŸ‘·" ;;         # CI/CD
  chore*) add_gitmoji "ğŸ§¹" ;;      # Maintenance
  revert*) add_gitmoji "âª" ;;     # Revert
  deps*) add_gitmoji "ğŸ“¦" ;;       # Dependencies
  security*) add_gitmoji "ğŸ”’" ;;   # Security
  release*) add_gitmoji "ğŸš€" ;;    # Release
esac

```
